creator: Noriko_Kobayashi@yokogawa.co.jp
text:
I'm working on Win2K(sp2),Tomcat3.2.3.

I use RequestDispatcherget to forward a request to a servlet like 

getServletContext().getRequestDispatcher("/Servlet2/").forward(req,
resp) . 
In the forwarded servlet ( Servlet2 ) I print out the request parameters. 
But I am not getting the request parameter in that servlet.
A req.getPathInfo() returns null with Tomcat3.2.3.
This works fine with Tomcat3.1.1, but not with 3.2.3.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 3262 ***
creator: nacho@apache.org
nacho@apache.org
text: Oops, typo in duplicate bug is 3162 not 3262 sorry ant-dev
